summary: Replaces main menu theme with 331Erock\'s \"Skyrim Meets Metal\" audio.
descriptionHtml:
To Install: Place the \"music\" file into the \"Data\" folder in the Skyrim file.

Make sure to comment with any improvements that you want! Thank you.

NOTE: I have permission from the writer of this song to use it.

Original video:
http://http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yDE2VQzghp4

331Erock\'s Awesome YouTube Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/331Erock
author: Fatalarrowhead
